places.clubpetroDescription: Significant contributions to ClubPetro's management system, a company responsible for accelerating results in over 1,200 fuel stations in Brazil. A comprehensive administrative system that handles all user registration, station management, loyalty programs, and loyalty.
places.letsDescription: Lets is a renowned software factory that has delivered hundreds of successful projects. During my journey here, I had the opportunity to collaborate with various interdisciplinary teams and use a wide range of technologies, always aiming to achieve the highest level of customer satisfaction.
places.skolenDescription: Skolen is a startup with a mission to revolutionize school management. We have a comprehensive system for managing students, classes, teachers, and monitoring engagement and reducing school dropout. I had the privilege of being involved in the development from the beginning, collaborating with a talented interdisciplinary team of programmers and designers.
